compatibility.notes: OLDAP-2.3 is a permissive license that allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL and AGPL.

key_requirements: Include the license text in all distributions.
Do not use the name 'OpenLDAP' without permission.
license.name: OLDAP-2.3
obligations: Retain copyright statements and notices in source code redistributions.
Reproduce copyright statements, conditions, and disclaimer in binary redistributions.
Include a verbatim copy of the license document in redistributions.
Obtain prior written permission from the OpenLDAP Foundation to use the name 'OpenLDAP' for endorsement or promotion.
Obtain prior written permission from the OpenLDAP Foundation to use 'OpenLDAP' in product names.
Give due credit to the OpenLDAP Project.
